mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_idx, member_id, member_password, member_email, member_zipcode, member_addr, member_addr_detail, member_agree, regdate, moddate ) VALUES ( seq_member.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberAddrDetail}, #{memberAgree}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_email = #{member_email}
SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail}
SELECT member_email FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT a.*, b.member_role, c.board_idx, d.comment_idx FROM member a INNER JOIN auth b ON a.member_id = b.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN board_likes c ON a.member_idx = c.member_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN comment_likes d ON a.member_idx = d.member_idx WHERE a.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_email = #{memberEmail}, moddate = SYSDATE WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx}
UPDATE member SET member_zipcode = #{memberZipcode}, member_addr = #{memberAddr}, member_addr_detail = #{memberAddrDetail}, moddate = SYSDATE WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx}
UPDATE member SET member_agree = #{memberAgree}, moddate = SYSDATE WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx}
UPDATE member SET member_password = #{memberPassword}, moddate = SYSDATE WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_email = #{memberEmail}
